thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 12 of 61
thread.title: Naufal

author: Naufal
title: Naufal
text: The customer service is just really nice. They sent me the wrong size of the shoes, and after discussing with the team and manager they decided to give me the wrong shoes for free and refund the money because it was holiday season and returning the shoe would cost more than the value of the shoes they said. Their mistakes on sending the wrong size i think its acceptable because it was holiday season and it was very hectic, nevertheless i would really like to purchase more from SSENSE.
